1.action: move the cursor to the menu bar
1.description: when moving the cursor to the menu bar, show the content of the menu bar. there are 3 buttons with text" SEARCH ISSUES", "CREATE ISSUE" and "ABOUT".

2.action: click one issue on the kanban board
2.description: after clicking one issue on the kanban board, a new component pop out, which contain the details of this issue: Type, Bug, Story, Task, Status, ASSIGNEES, REPORTER and PRIORITY.

3.description: after clicking "Project settings" button, the page shows the project details, and provide text box to modify it.

4.description: after clicking "Recently Updated" button, select it as tag, and the kanban board will only show issues with tag "Recently Updated"

5.description: after clicking "Add a comment" text box, the text box expand and "save" button and "cancel" button appear.
